root.name: Army of Two: The Devil's Cartel
root.description: OverviewThis game focuses on two new characters introduced as Alpha and Bravo. Those are the only names that will be given for these characters in order to let players "inject themselves" into the two more than they did for Salem and Rios. Post ReleaseGame was originally advertised up until release to be developed by Visceral Games. Final copy has no mention of Visceral Games on cover or in game credits.
